data.title: BLUE CHAMPAGNE
data.meta_description: Niles, Illinois: Dark Harvest, 1986. Octavo, cloth. First edition. data.text:
Varley, John. BLUE CHAMPAGNE. Niles, Illinois: Dark Harvest, 1986. Octavo, cloth. First edition. One of 75 special "publisher's copies" with colophon marked "P/C" in place of limitation number, signed by Varley and artist Todd Cameron Hamilton. Collects eight stories. Includes "Press Enter," winner of the 1985 Hugo and 1984 Nebula awards for best novella, and "The Pusher," winner of the 1982 Hugo award for best short story. A fine copy in fine dust jacket and faded paper slipcase. (#89623).

Price: $100.00
